en.bdb: The daggers and spears are producing rustling sound and the chopped dead heads, having rolled in dust, are scattered here and there.315.

en.bdb: The peculiar types of arrows, drawing pictures are being discharged in the battlefield and the knocking of the spears in the battlefield and the knocking of the spears in the shields is being heard.

en.bdb: The terrible sound of big drums is being heard in the ears. The jingling of anklets and the sweet voice of flutes are also being heard in the battlefield.320.
